post.title: sd870 compact case
post.content: what are you using for your sd870 case (pouch) ? i am looking for a minimalist case. something to offer a little protection from the elements and handling but not too restrictive for quick access and without too much bulk. i ran a couple of searches on the forum but didn't turn up much. as i search i will try to update this post with options i find. in terms of dimensions the canon site tech sheet lists them as: dimensions (w x h x d) 3.65 x 2.32 x 1.02 in./92.6 x 58.8 x 25.9mm straight from canon the psc-55: the amazon reviews for using it on the 870 are not inspiring but you'd think canon's own case would work. from amazon from bh
